name: Gourney (Demo)
description:
Gourney (Demo)

3D Action multiplayer with low poly art style.

Agricultural areas, mines, and even the castle of the city lord have been destroyed by these beasts, causing trouble to all the people in the city. Now he needs someone to come and be brave and help the townspeople. to escape from the beasts.

Fight bosses, who are the rulers of each location.  

Choose a trusty weapon that we will use to fight the boss. 

Collect the boss pieces to upgrade your weapon and armor.

Team up with other players up to 4 players to challenge the boss.

BOSS

The Boar

Arachne 

Assasin

Cerberus [Coming Soon]

Orc [Coming Soon]

Controls

WASD - Movement
Mouse movement - Rotate camera / look around
Mouse left click - Primary Attack
Mouse right click - Block / Aim
Q - First skill
E - Second skill
Left shift - Run / Dash
Left Ctrl - Sheath

Found a bug? sorry to hear that. BUT! let us know here! ＞︿＜

OwaOwa-Team
Hi! this is our first project here, so we hope you will like it :D
